title: HTML input with datalist test
description: A sample datalist attached to a text input

output.output: "Edit combo"
"What is your favorite animal? Edit combo, to set the value use the arrow keys or type the value."
"edit"
"What is your favorite animal? Edit, type in text"
"Blank, Edit, has popup"
"What is your favorite animal? Edit has popup, type in text"
"What is your favorite animal?, edit text"
"What is your favorite animal?, edit text"
"Edit combo"
"What is your favorite animal? Edit combo, to set the value use the arrow keys or type the value."

chrome.notes: The role is not consistently conveyed across browsers, and is often presented with a modifier ("combo" or "has popup") to convey the presence of the datalist.

output.output: "edit"
"What is your favorite animal? Edit, type in text"

ie.notes: When paired with IE, JAWS does not alter the role to convey the datalist functionality.

output.output: "Blank, Edit, has popup"
"What is your favorite animal? Edit has popup, type in text"

chrome.notes: The datalist is conveyed as a menu as opposed to a listbox.
